name: U.S. gross domestic product, R&D, and ratio of R&D to gross domestic product (and components): 1953–2022
description: U.S. gross domestic product, R&D, and ratio of R&D to gross domestic product (and components): 1953–2022

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: value
variableMeasured.unitText: Billions of current and of constant 2017 dollars and R&D as a percentage of GDP

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. For trend comparisons, use only the historical data reported in this table because some back-year data may have been revised.
sources: GDP data from Bureau of Economic Analysis, National Economic Accounts, Gross Domestic Product, https://www.bea.gov/national/, accessed 27 October 2023; R&D data from National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, National Patterns of R&D Resources (annual series).
